_header: As I me walked in a May morning / I heard a bird sing cuckoo
Subjects: chansons d’aventure ; songs; birds, as narrators
_description: Fragment of a song — two lines and portion of a third

BLAdd60577.Transcription:
As I me walkid in a may morningI hard a byrd sing Cokcowas I me
                    walked in a may mor…
